data.title: Funding Decisions Database
meta_keywords: Research institutes ; Governance ; Medical research ; Ethics ; Initiatives ; Partnerships ; Assessment ; Public involvement
data.meta_description: Resource providing access to different units and initiatives of the Canadian Institutes of Health Research.
data.text:
The values listed in this field are taken from The Standard Classification of Countries and Areas of Interest (SCCAI).

Selecting a country and/or region will display all results where either the Institution Paid or the Research Institution is in the selected country/region.

The list of institutions displays all institutions including affiliates.

When searching for an institution, the affiliates are not included in the results, however affiliates can be searched independently.

Information regarding the Institution Paid or the Research Institution (where the research is conducted) can be retrieved using the following search fields:

Institution Paid

Research Institution

Institutions

CIHR is composed of thirteen "virtual" institutes, each of which is focused on a specific area in the broad field of health research. Most CIHR approved grants and awards are associated with an institute.

CIHR has classified health research into four research themes, also referred to as pillars of research. Most CIHR approved grants and awards are identified with a theme, while some are not (e.g. Equipment Grants).
